original_text: The next morning, a group of Jews talked together about how they might kill Paul. They agreed to make a promise to God. They would not eat or drink anything until they had killed Paul.
korean_text: 날이 새매 유대인들이 당을 지어 맹세하되 바울을 죽이기 전에는 먹지도 아니하고 마시지도 아니하겠다 하고

sentences.original_text: a group of Jews talked together
about how they might kill Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 바울을 죽일 수 있을지에 대해

sentences.original_text: They agreed to make a promise to God
They would not eat or drink anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아무것도 먹지도 마시지도 않을 것이다
